sentences.sentence: The scandal has hit a nerve.Japan takes pride in one of the world's lowest crime rates.But it also has a fishily high conviction rate, at 99.9%.
sentences.translation: 这次丑闻触到了日本的痛处，它一直以拥有世界上最低的犯罪率而自豪，不过，日本同样也有着令人惊疑的高定罪率，达到了99.9%。

sentences.sentence: The scandal has hit a nerve. Japan takes pride in one of the world's lowest crime rates. But it also has a fishily high conviction rate, at 99.9%.
sentences.translation: 这次丑闻触到了日本的痛处，它一直以拥有世界上最低的犯罪率而自豪，不过，日本同样也有着令人惊疑的高定罪率，达到了99.9%。
